overview.tax_residency_rules: Expatriates are considered tax residents if they stay in Saudi Arabia for more than 183 days in a calendar year.
overview.tax_authority: General Authority of Zakat and Tax (GAZT)
overview.tax_filing_frequency: Annually, within 4 months after the end of the fiscal year.
overview.currency_exchange_rules: The Saudi Arabian Monetary Authority regulates currency exchange.

personal_income_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, Saudi Arabia has a territorial tax system but may tax foreign income under certain conditions.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 5% of salary (shared between employer and employee).

corporate_tax.deductions: Standard business expenses, depreciation, and research and development costs.

vat_gst.exemptions: Healthcare, education, and basic food items.

property_tax.exemptions: Residential properties used by the owner.

special_economic_zones.name: NEOM
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: 0% corporate tax and customs duty exemptions.
